name: Bashteroids
description:
You are the pilot of a WRECK Industries ship, assigned with clearing the place of asteroids, making way for the construction crews to create an intergalactic super highway. Be aware, though, that these asteroid fields are home to space bees that spit lasers, so there's that to watch out for. 

Dodge lasers, smash bugs, and bash asteroids in: BASHTEROIDS
